ygData.subject: Re: Baking is cool!
ygData.msgSnippet: make me around 5 just incase heheh ... From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy  To:  Sent: Thursday, July 29,
ygData.messageBody:
make me around 5 just incase heheh
----- Original Message -----
From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 07:05
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Baking is cool!


> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> sure... how many goo do u need? ill pass u on friday nite k? the only time
i
> can get online...
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 8:03 AM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Baking is cool!
>
>
> > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> >
> > yes!!! yes!!! yes!!! some1 make me a goo!!!! need it for soulfire!!!
> >
> > "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:
> >
> > > hi guys,ive tried baking fer the last couple of days... every now n
> > > then... working on my baking skills... only from yesterday nite (or
> > > rather today since its 7am now hehee) i discovered baking is cool! and
> > > reasonably good money for starters. The only bad thing is getting the
> > > skill up and it requires... Skill 5-20 Edible Goo - Fire Beetle Eye +
> > > Rat EarSkill 20-35 Bat Wing Crunchies - Frosting + Bat WingSkill 35-82
> > > Fish Fillet - Fish + Jug of SauceI have only managed to get to 82.
> > > From skill 60 onwards, I start to make some money... perhaps enough to
> > > cover the cost for the fish n sauce... i didnt take note of the
> > > numbers as I was spending time trying to up my fishing skill as
> > > well... so not sure bout that bit... when my fishing skill max out fer
> > > my level... i started buying fish n sauce... n thast when i discover i
> > > make some moeny... from what i see... this is as good as brewing... in
> > > fact slightly better... bcos u only need 2 components... below is the
> > > breakdown (from neriak).1 fish sell for 3sp 1cp1 jug of sauce sell for
> > > 1sp 3 cpTotal Cost = 4sp 4cp If successful, i make 2 fish fillet, each
> > > sell for 4sp 8cp so 2 will make 9sp 6cp. Profit of 100% At close to 70
> > > i get like 70% successful... so profit is pretty good... 80 as well...
> > > but sometimes do get down on the luck n fail quite a few in a
> > > row... another way to get those items to go to Freeport and ask
> > > newbies to get those items... i tried to get most myself... so that
> > > explains the long time taken... at the final stage... i auction for 20
> > > batwings fer 5gp... tons of em will rush to get those wings fer u...
> > > so it worked pretty fine...if u guys are bored of fighting stuff...
> > > maybe u can give it a try and gain some useful skills... maybe just
> > > enough to buy our spells... but IMHO thats enough... least till level
> > > 20... :) thast all bout baking...NicademousA Dark Elf Necromancer that
> > > stayed up all nite just to make some fish
> > >
>
